name: Academic Minds
description: Equipping young adults with effective study skills and methods that prepare them for success at university and beyond. The programme nurtures self-discipline, initiative and independence, helping students become confident self-starters. Hosted at Epsom College Malaysia.
what_to_bring: Sleeping bag or bedroll, pillow, 5-7 sets of comfortable clothes, warm jumper or hoodie, rain jacket, underwear and socks, trainers or walking shoes, flip-flops, pyjamas, hat for sun protection, reusable water bottle, torch with spare batteries
requirements: All campers must submit a completed health form at least 7 days before camp. Medications must be clearly labeled. Campers must be free from contagious illnesses for at least 48 hours before arrival. Any allergies or medical conditions must be clearly listed. Check-in: 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM on Day 1. All campers must have basic medical insurance coverage.
highlights: ["Study skills workshops","Time management training","University preparation seminars","Leadership development activities","Academic mentorship sessions"]
amenities: [{"faqs":[{"answer":"Academic Minds focuses on developing effective study skills, time management, and self-discipline to prepare students for university-level work.","question":"What is Academic Minds about?"},{"answer":"The camp is designed for students aged 15-17 who are preparing for university.","question":"Who can attend this camp?"},{"answer":"Yes, we provide comprehensive medical care and have certified first aid staff on site 24/7.","question":"Is medical support available?"},{"answer":"Students receive personalized academic mentorship and participate in study skills workshops.","question":"What kind of academic support is provided?"},{"answer":"You can reach our support team via the contact form or email us at support@academicminds.com","question":"How can I contact support?"}]}]
faqs: [{"faqs":[{"answer":"Academic Minds focuses on developing effective study skills, time management, and self-discipline to prepare students for university-level work.","question":"What is Academic Minds about?"},{"answer":"The camp is designed for students aged 15-17 who are preparing for university.","question":"Who can attend this camp?"},{"answer":"Yes, we provide comprehensive medical care and have certified first aid staff on site 24/7.","question":"Is medical support available?"}]}]
included_in_price: All meals, accommodation, learning materials, airport transfers
not_included_in_price: International flights, personal expenses, travel insurance
cancellation_policy: Full refund if cancelled 30+ days before start date, 50% refund if cancelled 14-29 days before, no refund within 14 days
refund_policy: Refunds processed within 14 business days to original payment method
safety_protocols: All activities supervised by qualified staff, regular health checks, emergency protocols in place
insurance_info: Comprehensive travel and medical insurance required for all participants

name: Wild Minds
description: Empowering young people to explore entrepreneurship, leadership and AI in creative, hands-on ways. They will apply these skills to understand our environment and sustainability and learn how innovation can shape a better future. For students aged 11-17.
what_to_bring: Comfortable outdoor clothing, sturdy walking shoes, rain gear, sunscreen, insect repellent, reusable water bottle, notebook and pen, personal medications
requirements: Participants should have basic computer literacy. All campers must submit health forms and have valid travel insurance. Parental consent required for those under 18.
highlights: ["Entrepreneurship workshops","AI and technology sessions","Environmental conservation projects","Leadership development","Sustainability innovation challenges"]
daily_schedule: Expert mentorship from tech and conservation leaders, engaging learning experiences, chaperoned flights and transportation, full-board accommodation
included_in_price: Expert mentorship, all meals, accommodation, local transportation, learning materials, field trips
not_included_in_price: International flights, personal expenses, optional excursions
cancellation_policy: Full refund if cancelled 45+ days before start, 50% refund 30-44 days before, 25% refund 15-29 days before
safety_protocols: Experienced guides for all outdoor activities, emergency medical support, strict safety protocols
insurance_info: Comprehensive insurance included in camp fees

name: STEM Innovation Camp
description: Hands-on coding, robotics, and engineering projects for aspiring technologists and engineers. Learn programming fundamentals and build real projects.
what_to_bring: Laptop computer, comfortable clothes, notebook, water bottle, personal toiletries, medications if needed
requirements: Basic interest in technology recommended but no prior experience required. All campers must have travel insurance and completed medical forms.
highlights: ["Learn Python and JavaScript","Build robots from scratch","3D printing workshops","Team coding challenges","Guest speakers from tech industry"]
schedule: All workshops, materials, lunch daily, project kits
not_included_in_price: Full refund 30+ days before, 50% refund 14-29 days before, no refund within 14 days
refund_policy: First aid certified staff on-site, secure facilities, parent emergency contacts
